verbs.description: As if the Trump administration policy of [V: ripping] [ARG1: children] [ARG2: away from their parents] [ARGM-LOC: at the border] was not cruel enough , a Senate investigation has found that they ’ve lost some 1500 of those kids . I mean literally lost them , not knowing where they were placed . A Senate subcommittee has found that federal officials lost track of …
